channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 06:37 Air alert in Khmelnytskyi region. Stay tuned for further messages.
item.description: 🔴 06:37 Air alert in Khmelnytskyi region. Stay tuned for further messages. #Хмельницкая_область This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 06:29 Countering the threat of artillery fire in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Please note that the alarm is still ongoing in:- Dnipropetrovsk Region
item.description: 🟡 06:29 Countering the threat of artillery fire in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Please note that the alarm is still ongoing in:- Dnipropetrovsk Region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.
